## Calculating fold-change

```{r}
mat <- matrix(abs(as.integer(rnorm(50, mean = 10, sd = 3))), 
              nrow = 5, 
              ncol = 10)

colnames(mat) <- c(paste0("cond", 1:5), paste0("ctrl", 1:5))
rownames(mat) <- c(paste0("gene", 1:5))

getlog2FC <- function(mat) {
  cond <- mat[, startsWith(colnames(mat), "cond")]
  ctrl <- mat[, startsWith(colnames(mat), "ctrl")]
  
  return(log2(cond / ctrl))
}

print(getlog2FC(mat))
```
